lines.text: I don't know how yas done it but I know yas done it!
That'll teach ya to get any ideers.
But Boss you know I don't get any ideers.
Well make sure that you don't.

[Rocky and Mugsy have pulled off a robbery]
Gee! Some haul!
Yeah. All 14 karat.

[from the hole in the floor]
Carrots? Carrots? Who? What? When? Where? Why? How? Where? Who? When?
Hey, Mugsy, we better get some shut-eye if'n we're gonna pull that job tomorrow.
Okay, boss.
Why, those dirty crooks! Someone oughta teach 'em that crime doesn't pay, and it looks like that someone's gonna be me.
[Bugs placed a phone next to the sleeping Rocky's ear and speaks through the other line]
Hello? Calling Rocky? Hello? Rocky? Am I getting through to you, Rocky?
[Rocky's limp cigarette hanging from his lips springs up straight]
They're saying you trust your pal Mugsy with that suitcase of jewelery. Heh-heh. Don't make me laugh.
[Rocky awakens and looks around, then shrugs and goes back to sleep]

[speaking through phone]
Look at Mugsy laying over there, pretending he's asleep. And all the time, he's thinking, getting ideas.
[Rocky awakens again, goes over to the sleeping Mugsy and slaps him in the face, startling him awake]
That'll teach youse to get ideas.
But boss, you know I don't get any ideas.
Well, see that you don't.
[Bugs unscrews the light, then as Mugsy is about to screw in the light again, it falls on Rocky]
Mugsy, c'mere.
But, but, but boss, I...
[Rocky kicks Mugsy up in the air four times]
Maybe, that'll teach ya's. Now get back on that couch and go to sleep.
Okay, boss.
[Bugs throws Rocky's cigarette and replaces it with a stick of dynamite on his mouth, then he sneaks up behind the couch where Mugsy is sleeping]

[imitating Rocky]
Hey, Mugsy, c'mere. Gimme a light.
Okay, boss. Yeah, boss. Yeah, yeah. Gee, I'm glad you're not mad at me no more.
[He list the dynamite, then it explodes on Rocky]
Aw, now you're mad at me again! But, but boss...
[Rocky beats up Mugsy, ties his arms and legs, and throws him into the next room]
Now get in the other room. NOW GO TO SLEEP!
[He hits Mugsy with a baseball bat and leaves]
[Bugs saws a circle around Rocky's chair with a saw which it falls into with Rocky, then he slips the saw into Mugsy's hands. Rocky enters the other room]
I don't know how ya's done it, BUT I KNOW YA'S DONE IT!
[He beats up Mugsy and leaves]
